handoff.one_sentence_goal: Build and verify a conversion-focused single-page launch page for CognOS targeting developers and CTOs.
handoff.problem_statement: There is currently no dedicated landing page that effectively communicates the value of CognOS to developers and CTOs, potentially leading to missed engagement and conversion opportunities.
objective: Communicate the core features and benefits of CognOS clearly.
Feature a 'Proof Snapshot' Call To Action (CTA) that encourages users to engage with the product.
scope_in: Design and implement a single-page layout with responsive design.
Incorporate a section dedicated to trust-infrastructure positioning.
Integrate a 'Proof Snapshot' CTA linking to GitHub and onboarding resources.
scope_out: No backend development or server-side functionalities.
No additional pages or navigational elements beyond the single-page layout.
functional_requirements: The page must load within 2 seconds.
The layout must be mobile-responsive and adhere to best practices for user experience.
Include direct links for the 'Proof Snapshot' CTA to the GitHub repository and the onboarding page.
acceptance_criteria: The landing page is visually appealing and aligns with CognOS branding.
All links function correctly and direct users to the intended resources.
User feedback indicates a clear understanding of the product's value proposition.
handoff.build_prompt: Create a single-page launch page for CognOS focused on conversion for developers and CTOs. Do NOT implement any backend services or additional pages. Include sections for core features, trust-infrastructure positioning, and a 'Proof Snapshot' CTA linking to GitHub (https://github.com/CognOS) and onboarding (https://cognos.com/onboarding). Ensure the design is responsive and fast-loading.
handoff.verification_prompt: Verify that the single-page launch page for CognOS fully meets the acceptance criteria of visual appeal, functional links, and clarity of product value proposition for developers and CTOs.
handoff.qa_test_prompt: Conduct a quality assurance test of the single-page launch page for CognOS including functionality checks for all links, responsiveness on various device sizes, and user feedback on understanding the product's benefits.
handoff.lovable_build_prompt: Create a single-page launch page for CognOS focused on conversion for developers and CTOs. Do NOT implement any backend services or additional pages. Include sections for core features, trust-infrastructure positioning, and a 'Proof Snapshot' CTA linking to GitHub (https://github.com/CognOS) and onboarding (https://cognos.com/onboarding). Ensure the design is responsive and fast-loading.
